actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: A bill to improve the provision of financial literacy training and information relating to the Blended Retirement System to members of the Armed Forces.
short_title: Re-open Enrollment for Servicemembers to Opt-in to Updated Retirement Choice for Enduring Security Act of 2021

summary.text:
Re-open Enrollment for Servicemembers to Opt-in to Updated Retirement Choice for Enduring Security Act of 2021 or the RESOURCES Act of 2021

This bill modifies the financial literacy training program for servicemembers (and spouses of such members) and revises procedures related to choosing retirement pay, including by creating additional open enrollment periods.

titles.title: A bill to improve the provision of financial literacy training and information relating to the Blended Retirement System to members of the Armed Forces.
Re-open Enrollment for Servicemembers to Opt-in to Updated Retirement Choice for Enduring Security Act of 2021
